Name: Delmarva Cocktail No.1
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A minty fresh, dry, whiskey-based palate cleanser.
History: Created by Ted "Dr. Cocktail" Haigh, who hails from America's Delmarva Peninsula. I believe Ted's original recipe (and certainly our previous rendition of it) comprised: 60ml (2oz) Bourbon 15ml (½oz) Dry vermouth 15ml (½oz) White crème de menthe 15ml (½oz) Lemon juice I reworked and rebalanced this to the above recipe in August 2022.
Nutrition: One serving of Delmarva Cocktail No.1 contains 188 calories
